alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Franklin; Highland; Madison; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 10:51PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN FRANKLIN, EASTERN FAYETTE, PICKAWAY, NORTHEASTERN HIGHLAND, SOUTHEASTERN MADISON AND ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 PM EDT... At 1050 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located from near London to near Cynthiana, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Reynoldsburg, Grove City, Chillicothe, Washington Court House, Circleville, Greenfield, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Ashville, Mount Sterling, South Bloomfield, Kingston, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, Bainbridge, New Holland, Logan Elm Village, North Folk Village and Obetz. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 105 and 111. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 73 and 104. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Fayette; Franklin; Highland; Madison; Pickaway; Ross
